## EventEmitter class

A simple implementation of an event emitter.

The `EventEmitter` class provides methods to subscribe to events (`on`<!-- -->) and to trigger those events (`emit`<!-- -->).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class EventEmitter 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [emit(event, args)](./pipeline.eventemitter.emit.md) |  | Emits a specified event with the provided arguments, invoking all subscribed listeners for that event. |
|  [on(event, listener)](./pipeline.eventemitter.on.md) |  | Subscribes a listener function to a specified event. |
